txt.en: Meneldor has failed to return to the agreed-upon meeting location. Landroval grows concerned for his friend's safety, as the spider-hole to the west remains the most likely unsearched location.

'I believe that Meneldor may be in great danger. He should have returned by now. It is not in his nature to ignore a meeting, yet there is no trace of him in these hills.\n\n'Only one location remains unsearched. I do not wish to place you in such danger, but I dare not go there myself. There is a cavern to the west of here that appears inhabited by spiders. Such a place is treacherous for an Eagle! Explore the cave and attempt to locate Meneldor within.'
Venom-bite spider-cave lies west of Landroval's hidden clearing.\n\nLandroval has requested that you discover the entrance to the spider-lair he viewed to the west.
'I am relieved to see you again... and still whole and hale. You have done us a great service, and we shall not soon forget the aid that you have lent us, [placeholder].'
Venom-bite spider-cave lies west of Landroval's hidden clearing.\n\nLandroval has asked you to search inside the spider-lair for his missing friend, Meneldor.
Landroval can be found at the clearing of trees in the north-east section of the Wailing Hills.\n\nLandroval awaits your return and will be eager to see his friend Meneldor as well.
'Be on guard, for there are foul things which may lurk in the dark. Gather your courage and seek out the cave in the hills to the west.'
Locate the entrance of the spider-cave
Enter the cave and search for Meneldor
